reviews.review: Everything about this game is great. From the somewhat challenging bonus maps to the final battle with GLaDOS, this game has everything that a puzzle game should have.

literal old school cool.
party like it's XXXX with GlaDOS in the first iteration of the reeeally frickin good puzzle series that is portal.

Portal é um jogo antigo, mas que eu amo muito, principalmente pela história.
Toda a jogabilidade, mecânicas, puzzles, tudo isso me prendeu muito, e eu não me arrependo nem um pouco de ter jogado.
Cool puzzle game 10/10 will play again and again for community maps.

19.12.11
刚入游戏，因为秋促打折安利买的hhh，刚开始的时候跟个傻子一样到处乱转，后来才发现这些道具竟然是这样玩的Σ(っ °Д °;)っ，很佩服这个游戏的主概念，利用一把能发射传送门的枪来让自己找到出口，搬石头，后面应该有新的有趣玩法吧，主角应该是一个妹子比较烧脑哈，总而言之，这个游戏还是蛮有意思的哈！哇，还没玩多久了，都1点58分了，睡了睡了，熬夜实在顶不住啦。。。找个时间再来看看吧
bela jogabilidade e historia, sempre vai ser uns dos melhores da valve
O jogo está muito bem feito, efeitos sonoros optimos, gráficos bons e tradução está boa. Comprei o portal 2 também, depois de zerar este vou experimentá-lo e se for bom irei querer portal 3
обзор для осенней распродажи 2019

Muito bom, historia evolvente... Melhores 2 reais gastos da minha vida :D

Acabado en 3 horas. Es una experiencia muy interesante y el juego es tremendamente satisfactorio de jugar. Resolver los rompecabezas usando todo el tiempo mecánicas nuevas no cansa. Y del tramo final, nada que comentar. Revolucionario. Recomiendo comprarlo cuando esté de oferta, ya que yo lo he pillado por 80 céntimos más o menos.
Demasiado corto el juego, pero bastante entretenido.

The cake wasn't a lie (ಥ﹏ಥ)
PS: Love U GLaDOS <3

Рекомендую однозначно. Хорошая головоломка в интересном сеттинге, который стал визитной карточкой серии. Проходить уровни, используя законы физики и портал-пушку очень даже увлекательно, не смотря на то, что прошло много лет с выхода игры, она по-прежнему стоит вашего внимания.
Einfach ein muss zum Spielen.

15 스테이지부터 머리를 좀 써야 합니다.
재밌어요!

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!
It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.
Aperture Science:
We do what we must
because we can
For the good of all of us
Except the ones who are dead
But there's no sense crying over every mistake
You just keep on trying till you run out of cake
And the Science gets done
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are still alive
I'm not even angry
I'm being so sincere right now
Even though you broke my heart
And killed me
And tore me to pieces
And threw every piece into a fire
As they burned it hurt because I was so happy for you!
Now these points of data make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta
We're releasing on time
So I'm GLaD. I got burned
Think of all the things we learned
for the people who are still alive
Go ahead and leave me
I think I prefer to stay inside
Maybe you'll find someone else to help you
Maybe Black Mesa
THAT WAS A JOKE
HAHA. FAT CHANCE
Anyway, this cake is great
It's so delicious and moist
Look at me still talking
when there's Science to do
When I look out there, it makes me GLaD I'm not you
I've experiments to run
There is research to be done
On the people who are still alive
Believe me I am still alive
I'm doing Science and I'm still alive
I feel FANTASTIC and I'm still alive
While you're dying I'll be still alive
And when you're dead I will be still alive
STILL ALIVE
